org.grouplens.lenskit.util

Class DelimitedTextCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.AbstractCursor<java.lang.String[]>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.DelimitedTextCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String[]>, Cursor<java.lang.String[]>

    public class DelimitedTextCursor
extends AbstractCursor<java.lang.String[]>
    Cursor that reads rows of delimited text from a scanner.
    Since:
    0.10

    • Constructor Summary

      DelimitedTextCursor(java.io.File file, java.lang.String delim)
      Construct a delimited text cursor from a file.
